extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    BCHM218 (or MBIO 218)
COREQUISITES    BCHM 310/6.0 or (BCHM 315/3.0 and BCHM 316/3.0).
EQUIVALENCY    PATH 410/3.0

basic.description:
An introduction to pathology and molecular medicine. The course will be organized around a specific set of diseases, designed to illustrate basic concepts in the molecular biology, biochemistry, and pathology of human disease.
RECOMMENDATION    ANAT 215/3.0 and ANAT 216/3.0 and PHGY 212/6.0.
basic.subject: PATH
basic.title: Path and Molecular Medicine
